content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: UpdateUser path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/identity/v1/users/{user_id} content: params
name userid
desc a user id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum update a user
desc update a users nonessential properties such as their phone number
reqbody
identityupdateuserrequest
type obj
props
name
type str
desc the users new name
phonenumber
type str
desc the users new phone number
required true
responses
200
identityupdateuserresponse
type obj
success
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not the request was successful
desc a response from a request to update a users nonessential properties phone number etc
title: 32_Users_UpdateUser_181.json
